revised_title: A Description of a Remarkable Endemic Disease in the Bambara Nation
tldr: The author describes a large and rare testicular swelling, or sarcocele, in a black man from the Bambara nation in Senegal. The disease appears to be endemic to the region and may be caused by a combination of factors, including climate, diet, hereditary disposition, and other unknown causes. The author suggests further research to better understand this unique condition.
